mxCell.value: Purpose: Executive + operational overview, alerts, daily approvals, KPIs
Today’s operations summary (work tickets, labour deployed, machines active)
Production (plucked kg, latex kg, harvest outputs)
Weather risk alerts (heavy rain, high wind)
Estate Manager View + approve plans, budgets
Storekeepers / Operators / Labour Minimal view (tasks only)
Purpose: GIS-based plantation map + location-based decisions
Estate Manager/Superintendent View + maintain boundaries + field notes + assign tasks by field
Field Officers/Survey/GIS Officer Full edit rights (boundaries, layers)
Purpose: Crop lifecycle and agronomy records (the “agronomy master module”).
Crop type, clone/variety, planting date, age class
Planned operations by month (fertilize, prune, weed, spray)
Quality metrics (tea leaf standard, latex DRC, fruit bunch grading)
Estate Manager View + approve programs + review outcomes
Superintendents/Field Officers Create/update crop records, logs, observations
Labour Only assigned tasks + completion confirmation (mobile)
Purpose: Plan, issue, apply, and track fertilizer by field and cost.
Recommendations per field (based on soil test / zone / crop age)
Date, field, product, rate (kg/ha), labour, supervisor
Estate Manager Approve programs and requisitions
Superintendent/Agronomy Officer Create program + schedule + verify completion
Purpose: Scouting + sensors + inspection + recommendations (early warning).
Weed pressure, pest/disease incidence, nutrient deficiency
Suggested spray / fertilizer adjustment / drainage repair
Estate Manager Review + approve intervention actions
Superintendents/Field Officers Create observations, assign actions
Spray/Weeding Teams Receive tasks triggered by monitoring
Purpose: Asset register + allocation + maintenance + fuel + operator logs.
Directors/GM View CAPEX, utilization, high-level costs
Estate Manager Approve allocations and repairs spend
Mechanical Engineer/Workshop Officer Full maintenance control
Drivers/Operators Daily log entry + pre-start checklist (mobile)
Storekeeper Spares issue + fuel issue (if store owns fuel)
Purpose: Shade tree management + timber + conservation + compliance zones.
Shade tree species, density by field
Directors/GM View compliance + timber revenue (if any)
Forestry Officer/Superintendent Operate inventory, plans, execution logs
Purpose: Chemical safety + spray program + weeding program + compliance.
Receive, batch, expiry, MSDS, issue control
Field, area covered, mix rate, operator, PPE checklist
Estate Manager Approve spray programs + chemical requests
Chemical Storekeeper Full chemical stock control
Spray Operators/Weed Teams Task execution + checklist logging (mobile)
